description: Max Payne is a popular third-person shooter video game in which players play as a New York City police detective named Max Payne. Rockstar Games released Max Payne in 2001.

Those playing the Windows version of Max Payne can use MPM files to modify the game's content. To do so, a player must place the MPM file in Max Payne's installation directory. Modders can also use Max Payne modding tools, such as RASMaster and MaxPaynePacker, to unpack MPM files and customize their contents.
